alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy; Ramsey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 11:47PM CDT until September 05 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Benson County in northeastern North Dakota... Southwestern Ramsey County in northeastern North Dakota... Eddy County in northeastern North Dakota... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1146 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm has produced severe winds near Devils Lake area, moving north at 45 mph. Gusty winds are following severe thunderstorm activity and are producing gusts up to 60 mph. This will continue for at least the next 45 minutes. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Devils Lake, New Rockford, Camp Grafton, Lakewood Park, Maddock, Fort Totten and Minnewaukan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
